description:
Deep sixing the need for petroleum-based raw materials, the P-6 is made from recycled bottles and scrap fabrics. Making it reduces water use and keeps stuff out of the world's landfills and incinerators. Original artwork is screen-printed using PVC- and phthalate-free inks.Made from 50% recycled cotton, 50% post-consumer recycled polyester.Screen-print inks are PVC- and phthalate-free.Taped shoulder seams for comfort and fit retentionRegular fit wears like an old favourite.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Bluesign® Approved Material






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia P-6 Label Pocket Responsibili-Tee - Men's
